name: foyer
topic: The grand entrance hall of the mansion, featuring a large staircase with a hanging chandelier. The walls adorned with priceless paintings, a minibar can be seen in the far right of the Foyer.

timestamps.2000: You find Bartholomew at the minibar, having a double scotch.

search: You take a look around and find 5 presents on top of a wall table, all labeled: "Bartholomew Blackwood", except for one: "Stella Blackwood".
